info.description: file and media hosting server with a web dashboard for bucket and resource management and RESTful API.
info.title: AOUI Drive API

post.description: Create a new client with access credentials (Admin only)
Regenerate the secret key for a client (Admin only)
Login with access key and secret key to get JWT token

get.description: List all buckets owned by the authenticated client

post.description: Create a new storage bucket for the authenticated client. If public=true, a symlink is created in the public folder.

get.description: List all webhook URLs for a bucket

post.description: Create a new webhook URL for a bucket

get.description: Get details of a specific webhook URL

post.description: Add a custom header to a webhook URL

get.description: Get details of a specific bucket by ID

delete.description: Delete a bucket by ID (bucket must be empty)

get.description: Check if the service and its dependencies are ready
List all resources in a bucket

put.description: Upload a resource to a bucket using request body stream. The file hash (SHA-256) becomes the resource identifier for deduplication. Use X-File-Extension header to specify the file extension (e.g., ".jpg", ".log"). Optional headers with X-Webhook-Header- prefix will be forwarded to webhook endpoints.

parameters.description: Optional headers to forward to webhooks (prefix stripped)
parameters.name: X-Webhook-Header-*

post.description: Upload a resource to a bucket using multipart form file upload. The file hash (SHA-256) becomes the resource identifier for deduplication. Optional headers with X-Webhook-Header- prefix will be forwarded to webhook endpoints.

parameters.description: Optional headers to forward to webhooks (prefix stripped)
parameters.name: X-Webhook-Header-*

get.description: Download a resource from a bucket by its hash

delete.description: Delete a resource from a bucket by its hash

head.description: Get metadata of a resource without downloading the content

BearerAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer <token>
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
